HIBPwned

Utilising the HaveIBeenPwned.com API, check whether email addresses and/or user names have been present in a publicly disclosed data breach.

Head over to the package website for more information, in particular the functions reference, an intro to the package usage and the news.

If you get a lot of value out of this package, do consider donating to HaveIbeenPwned.com as it’s a tremendous service.

Please note that this project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By participating in this project you agree to abide by its terms.
